string.text: {CAPTIVE_NAME} kneels bound before you, helpless to resist your whims. What fate do you have in mind for her?
Clothe her in rags.
Change what she's wearing.

{CAPTIVE_NAME} kneels bound before you, helpless to resist your whims. What fate do you have in mind for him?
